1106304210902093840.text:
CVE-2019-5418 looks really juicy. Rails File Disclosure. Now, if the app uses Marshal.load() sessions (is that still the default?) and you get the signing key (just read /proc/self/environ or http://config.ru ), that's RCE (http://phrack.org/issues/69/12.html …).

Patch or get pwned. :>

1083283501061980160.text:
Google Public DNS Service (8.8.8.8) Now Supports DNS-over-TLS #Security Feature

https://thehackernews.com/2019/01/google-dns-over-tls-security.html …

It not just helps in hiding your web-browsing history from ISPs and eavesdroppers, but also prevents DNS spoofing attacks.pic.twitter.com/slGbLLOu9i

1123972455478042624.text: Unpopular opinion: Windows network/OS security is hopelessly broken, and people who work on things like EDR tools and other defenses are doing more harm than good by propping up the corpse, and cosmetically legitimizing a dead platform as something suitable for corporate networks

1121440510080536576.text: Random Thought of the Day : @DeepMindAI should make a modern game similar to Black&White, but the little creature you train eventually grows up to become your Google Assistant.

1118565759527972864.text: Unpopular opinion I guess, but despite the shittiness of AMP, the SXG tech that will soon be powering it (https://developers.google.com/web/updates/2018/11/signed-exchanges …) is absolutely the way the web should be moving. This is the beginning of the decentralized web that we've all been dreaming of since the 90s.

1113539685748432896.text: Consider this tweet to be an informal petition to replace the little retweet/like icons with pitchfork/torch icons. Not that it'll change the mechanics of anything, but it would definitely be more in line with how that functionality is currently being used.

1106716045018951680.text:
What's all this about making Daylight Savings Time permanent? All we need to do is get rid of DST. Solar Noon should happen around Noon, not 1pm (1:22pm in Portland during DST). Anything else is madness.

@OregonGovBrown don't give in to the pressures of the DST forever crowd!

986994755706896384.text: Just launched a bounty site for cracking crypto wallets, starting with an old one of mine :-)  The bounty is 5btc (currently valued at over 40k usd).  If you like cracking passwords, check out https://crackmywallet.org  #crackmywallet
